title: 나노공정 및 소자 연구실
content:
Nano Process and Device Laboratory (NPDL) is a research group led by professor Jinho Ahn. NPDL was established in 1995 within the Department of Material Science and Engineering at Hanyang University. Our group actively explores nano-processes and devices. Nano-patterning technologies including EUV Lithography and thin film process are the major research fields. 3D printing technologies and the new functional materials for 3D printing are also our new concems
